drops.name: Fire giant bone
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group='d'>Only during [[Rag and Bone Man II]]. Cannot be dropped by fire giants in the [[Stronghold Slayer Cave]].</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1108655941006835713|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/A1bcg|archivedate=May 18 2019|quote=The initial quest ones are guaranteed drops. The longer wish-list is 1/4.|date=21 Mar 2019}}

drops.name: Ensouled giant head
drops.drop_requirements:
{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Kieren|url=
https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/689153404288004097|date=18 Jan 2016|Archiveurl=http://archive.fo/gl8ED|Archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=Fair few people asking about ensouled head drop rates... Here you go! [https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CZBdXm_WUAIRceC.png:large]}}

drops.name: Looting bag
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group='d'>Only dropped by those found in the [[Wilderness]].</ref>{{NamedRef|name=Drop Rates V2}}

drops.name: Larran's key
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d name=wildytask>Only dropped while on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Krystilia]].</ref>

drops.name: Mysterious emblem
drops.drop_requirements: <ref name=wildytask group='d'>Only dropped while on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Krystilia]].</ref> {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/872520473749356549|date=7 June 2017|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/swS9N|archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=It's calculated off the HP: 1 in (155 - (HP/2)) There's none with HP over 300, but it'd disregard values higher than that.}}

drops.name: Slayer's enchantment
drops.drop_requirements: <ref name=wildytask group='d' />{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/973892117675298816|date=14 March 2018|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/CWYhV|archivedate=5 June 2019|quote=For nastier bosses (e.g. Callisto) it's 1/30. For other things it scales between 1/320 and 1/80 as the NPC's HP scales from 0 to 300.}}

drops.name: Brimstone key
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group='d'>Only dropped if killed on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Konar quo Maten]].</ref>{{CiteTwitter|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/1083783815141707781|author=Mod Kieren|date=16 January 2019|quote=0.2*(CBLEVEL - 100)^2 + 100}}{{CiteTwitter|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/1083781544135847936|author=Mod Kieren|date=16 January 2019|quote=It follows a curve up until level 100 then scales linearly between those 2 values upto level 350 combat. Creatures over thsi{{sic}} will cap at 1/50. [https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpdLK2W0AEynZy.jpg]}}

drops.name: Ancient shard
drops.drop_requirements: <ref name="catacomb" group='d'>Only dropped by those found within the [[Catacombs of Kourend]].</ref>

drops.name: Long bone
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/704316647708950528|date=29 Feb 2016|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/FSnrM|archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=All creatures with big bones use the same rates: 1/400 for the long bone, 1/5k for the curvy one.|name=special bones}}
